q.quote: Christmas is joy, religious joy, an inner joy of light and peace.
q.author: Pope Francis

q.quote: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
q.author: Vince Lombardi

q.quote: Vote for the man who promises least; he'll be the least disappointing.
q.author: Bernard Baruch

q.quote: So long as the memory of certain beloved friends lives in my heart, I shall say that life is good.
q.author: Helen Keller

q.quote: You cannot believe in God until you believe in yourself.
q.author: Swami Vivekananda

q.quote: When I started counting my blessings, my whole life turned around.
q.author: Willie Nelson

q.quote: Football is football and talent is talent. But the mindset of your team makes all the difference.
q.author: Robert Griffin III

q.quote: The difference between stupidity and genius is that genius has its limits.
q.author: Albert Einstein

q.quote: The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress, and grows brave by reflection.
q.author: Thomas Paine

q.quote: Sharing is good, and with digital technology, sharing is easy.
q.author: Richard Stallman

q.quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
q.author: Thomas A. Edison

q.quote: A woman's mind is cleaner than a man's: She changes it more often.
q.author: Thomas A. Edison

q.quote: I saw the angel in the marble and carved until I set him free.
q.author: Michelangelo

q.quote: I don't build in order to have clients. I have clients in order to build.
q.author: Ayn Rand

q.quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
q.author: Charles R. Swindoll
